No. COA14-1159. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Sept. 1, 2015.

In the Matter of the FORECLOSURE OF A DEED OF TRUST EXECUTED BY Geddie HERRING dated November 20, 2003 and Recorded in Book 10614 at Page 913 in the Wake County Public Registry, North Carolina.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINON

Affirmed.
